verses.text: \w After|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Josue \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* consulted \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Chanaanite, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* leader \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* war?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Juda \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Chanaanite, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Pherezite \w into|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Bezec \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* \w they|strong="H5221"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* Adonibezec \w in|strong="H4672"\w* Bezec, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w they|strong="H5221"\w* \w defeated|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Chanaanite, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Pherezite.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* Adonibezec \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H0310"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w took|strong="H0853"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w cut|strong="H7112"\w* \w off|strong="H7112"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* fingers \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w toes|strong="H0931"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* Juda going \w forward|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Chanaanite, \w that|strong="H0413"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* (\w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* whereof \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w former|strong="H6440"\w* \w times|strong="H6440"\w* Cariath-Arbe) \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* Sesai, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Ahiman|strong="H0289"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* Tholmai:

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3423"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w* hath \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w present|strong="H5704"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H0376"\w* \w being|strong="H8034"\w* sent away, \w went|strong="H0376"\w* \w into|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Hethim, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w there|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* Luza: \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w so|strong="H7121"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Manasses \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3423"\w* Bethsan, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* Thanac \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H3423"\w* \w villages|strong="H1323"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Dor|strong="H1756"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* Jeblaam, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* Mageddo \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H3423"\w* \w villages|strong="H1323"\w*. \w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Chanaanite \w began|strong="H2974"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.
